channel.title: Dueling Count Down
channel.description:
basically im on [pi] base when i challange someone to friendly duel or stake it works fine however when you are sent inside the arena there is no countdown 3-2-1 its just a constant flashing arrow are you are forever unable to attack.
any ideas?
